name: JSON Adapter
content:
# JSON Adapter

**Rules**
- RFC 8259 compliance; define JSON Schema (2020-12) for contracts; keep schemas near producers; stable ordering for diffs.

**Runbook**
```
jq -e . <file.json> > /dev/null
# run the project's schema validator for *.schema.json if configured
```

**References**
- RFC 8259 — https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc8259
- JSON Schema — https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/json-schema-validation.html
- jq Manual — https://stedolan.github.io/jq/manual/
